articles.title: Jennifer Lopez And Ben Affleck Reunite On ‘Kiss Of The Spider Woman’ Red Carpet - Deadline
articles.description: Lopez wore a daring, spider-themed dress; brought her rarely-seen teen twins Max and Emme; and received a celebratory smooch from ex Ben Affleck.

articles.title: Jennifer Lopez Poses with Her Twins, 17, at “Kiss of the Spider Woman” N.Y.C Screening - Yahoo News UK
articles.description: Jennifer Lopez poses with twins Max and Emme at the New York City special screening of her 'Kiss of the Spider Woman' red carpet event.

articles.title: Instagram Is Launching Its Own Awards for Creators: “Rings” (Exclusive) - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Spike Lee, Marc Jacobs and Instagram head Adam Mosseri will be among the judges of the Rings program, which will honor the platform's top creators with rings, both physical and digital.

articles.title: Andy Cohen Will Interview Howard Stern as SiriusXM Talks Continue - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: SiriusXM says they believe they will reach a deal with Stern, but has also drawn in other big names, including Alex Cooper, because of their talent-friendly approach.

articles.title: Trump Addresses Bad Bunny’s Super Bowl Booking, But Gets Sidetracked by His Hatred for NFL’s New Kick-Off Rule - Consequence of Sound
articles.description: Donald Trump has broken his silence on the NFL's decision to book Bad Bunny as the 2026 Super Bowl Halftime performer, though he seems much more bothered by the league's new kick-off rules.

articles.title: Taylor Swift Sparkles in an Unexpected, Super Short Silver Minidress for 'Tonight Show' Return - instyle.com
articles.description: Taylor Swift returned to 'The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon' after three years, wearing an unexpected silver minidress with off-the-shoulder design and sparkles all over. See her look, here.

articles.title: ‘Marty Supreme’ Makes Surprise World Premiere As New York Film Festival Secret Screening - Deadline
articles.description: Timothée Chalamet and Josh Safdie just surprised a New York Film Festival crowd by announcing it would see the world premiere of Marty Supreme.

articles.title: Taylor Swift Sure Had a Great Time at Selena Gomez’s Wedding - The Cut
articles.description: On Monday, Swift went on SiriusXM’s ‘The Morning Mash Up’ and said her longtime bestie, Selena Gomez, was the ‘most beautiful’ bride at her wedding.

articles.title: Jilly Cooper, British author of bestselling risqué novels, including ‘Rivals,’ dies at 88 - AP News
articles.description: British author Jilly Cooper, known for her bestselling novels, including “Rivals” and “Riders,” has died. She was 88. The author died on Sunday after a fall, a statement from her agency Curtis Brown said. Her agent, Felicity Blunt, praised Cooper for defining…

articles.title: Zelda Williams Finds AI Videos Of Robin Williams & Other Celebrities "Gross" & "Maddening": "Stop Believing I Wanna See It" - Deadline
articles.description: Zelda Williams is asking people to stop sending her AI-generated videos of her late father, Robin Williams.

articles.title: Pedro Pascal, Margot Robbie, Nicole Kidman and More Celeb Photos at the Chanel Fashion Show - Variety
articles.description: Chanel hosted the debut collection of its new artistic director, Matthieu Blazy, who wowed guests with his resolutely modern take.

articles.title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs' lawyers want him sent to a New Jersey federal prison that offers drug treatment - AP News
articles.description: Sean “Diddy” Combs’ lawyers want the hip-hop mogul sent to a low-security federal prison in New Jersey to serve his four-year, two-month prison sentence. They told a judge Monday that the facility’s drug treatment program will help him stay clean. Combs’ lawy…

articles.title: Rush announce reunion tour five years after the death of drummer Neil Peart - AP News
articles.description: Five years after their influential drummer Neil Peart died of glioblastoma, the Canadian band Rush have announced a reunion tour Monday. Rush co-founders Geddy Lee and Alex Lifeson revealed a 12-date, seven city tour is scheduled for summer 2026. It will kick…

articles.title: Zach Bryan Newest Song Takes Aim At ICE, Says America Is ‘Fading’ - Forbes
articles.description: A teaser for the seemingly liberal-leaning song “Bad News” claims “ICE is gonna come knock down your door.”

articles.title: Nicole Kidman Nails Classic French Style at Chanel - Vogue
articles.description: In a crisp white shirt and jeans, the Oscar-winning actor embodied effortless French style.

articles.title: Dwayne Johnson on Smashing Machine Being Worst Box Office Opening Ever - Variety
articles.description: Dwayne Johnson says you can't always look at box office as 'The Smashing Machine' becomes his worst opening ever.

articles.title: Taylor Swift shuts down 'shockingly offensive' fan theory about her and Travis Kelce - KRCR
articles.description: Taylor Swift loves a good fan theory and Easter egg, but she shut down one about the future of her career and marriage to Travis Kelce.

articles.title: ‘SNL’ shouts out ‘war-torn’ Portland in first cold open of the season - OregonLive.com
articles.description: The sketch featured Colin Jost as Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth.

articles.title: Finally, everyone can say bad things about Taylor Swift - CNN
articles.description: It’s finally open season on America’s sweetheart. Even the fans are finding “Life of a Showgirl” — and its messy attendant movie — rough going.

articles.title: The Best New Artist Field at the 2026 Grammy Awards Is Anyone’s Guess - Rolling Stone
